messages.messageBody:
I have em. Bob Elder East Coast Martial Art Supplies.
1 (800) 407-1592.

--- Mark Jaillet <mjaillet@...> wrote:

> Hi Everyone,
> I've been trying to order a
> "line drawing" poster on
> the parts of a Katana by W.M. Hawley. I found a
> supplier in California,
> "Bugei".
> For whatever reason, which I have not been given an
> answer to, I have not
> received the order yet I'm told it was shipped out
> Aug.30 !
> Now being Oct. 19, I doubt if I'll receive this
> item. Disappointing indeed.
> Does anyone know where I can prchase this item
> elsewhere? Preferrably in
> Canada?
>
> Thanks, Mark

messages.subject: Sourcing out Product
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone, I ve been trying to order a line drawing poster on the parts of a Katana by W.M. Hawley. I found a supplier in California, Bugei . For whatever
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everyone,
I've been trying to order a "line drawing" poster on
the parts of a Katana by W.M. Hawley. I found a supplier in California,
"Bugei".
For whatever reason, which I have not been given an answer to, I have not
received the order yet I'm told it was shipped out Aug.30 !
Now being Oct. 19, I doubt if I'll receive this item. Disappointing indeed.
Does anyone know where I can prchase this item elsewhere? Preferrably in
Canada?

Thanks, Mark


--
